title: Bank Earnings Roll In, Florida Seniors Could Seal Trump’s Election Fate
itunes:title: Bank Earnings Roll In, Florida Seniors Could Seal Trump’s Election Fate
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Chief Equity Strategist Gina Martin Adams and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson set the Businessweek Agenda. We breakdown bank earnings with Anton Schutz, President at Mendon Capital Advisors. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green discuss Josh's story on how a surge of early votes from seniors in Florida has put Joe Biden ahead in the critical battleground state. The impact of a lack of fiscal stimulus is on the mind of Frances Donald, Global Chief Economist and Head of Macro Strategy at Manulife Investment Management. And we Drive to the Close with Kevin Miller, CIO of The E-Valuator Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
